---
name: Translation proposal
about: Propose translations for a new language
title: "[l10n] Translations for xx-XX"
labels: translation
assignees: ''

---

** Please provide translation_template.csv

The most convenient way to provide language translations for ParquetViewer is to fill out the `NewLanguageValue` column in the `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/translation_template.csv` file available in the repo.

For more details see: https://github.com/mukunku/ParquetViewer/wiki/Translations
